basics.label: Executive Chef-Partner
basics.summary: Proven abilities in fine dining restaurants, catering, corporate dining and provisioning.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Daily supervision of BOH team members. Expertly estimated staffing needs and adjusted hourly schedules in accordance with demand patterns, budget and local labor laws.
highlights: Implemented portioning systems throughout all areas of the kitchen.
Reduced food costs by 9% by expertly estimating purchasing needs and buying through approved suppliers.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Plan and execute all off site catering and events for catering department. Obtain new clients and track sales.
highlights: Event planning of all sizes at all stages.
Menu planning and execution from prep to production.

education.institution: Kingsborough Community College Abraham Lincoln High School

skills.name: Chef Skills
keywords: Ability to work well either alone or as part of a team
